name: Kinesis (onceuponateam, aWiseChimera)
description:
✦ Grand Prize - Hits Playtime 2015

✦ Nominated - Game Critics (Montpellier In Game 2015)

✦ Showcased at - E3 2015 (BudGames), Geekopolis 2015 & Gaîté Lyrique (I LOVE Transmedia)

Kinesis is a first person game about reflexion and exploration.

Your journey starts on a strange living planet, inspired by Moebius' universe, a famous french comic artist.
Being attentive to the environment around you will be the key, in order to understand the planet, its story, and heal its wounds.
Everything is about creating your own path. You decide what you want to explore

In Kinesis, the player has two abilities :
• he can travel inside energetic flows
• he can guide their direction in many different ways
